title: Visual Learning and Virtual Reality-Based Language Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and language learning experience (beginner level)
context.additional_context: Contextual learning environment for in-service professionals using VR simulations and 2D-3D visualization tools in a practice-oriented language training program

learning_goals: Learners can apply situational expressions of the target language with 80% accuracy using visual cues in VR environments.
Learners can systematically design language learning content using visualization tools (2D/3D/infographics).
Learners can complete visual-language integrated materials for project-based assessments by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
